about_the_game:
Soulbond is an immersive and narrative-driven visual novel experience, where you'll shape your character's destiny through a series of pivotal choices. Your decisions will not only impact the narrative but also the relationships you build, revealing the balance between power, love, and grief.

Story

Hell is your home, a sprawling and malevolent realm with a hierarchy that governs every facet of existence. But you? You're a nobody here, just another face in the infernal crowd.
But fate has a funny way of granting second chances, even in Hell. From the depths of despair arises an opportunity—an unprecedented breakthrough from the Abyss, a nightmarish prison where God cast His most judged and monstrous creations, has been breached, and the very fabric of Hell trembles with the implications. For the first time in a long wait, the hierarchy seems dangerously fragile: the perfect state for you to carve your way in.
Now, it's your moment to seize.

Features

  • Craft your character's identity by choosing their name, height, pronouns, and origins. Are you a cambion, born and raised in Hell, or a fallen angel, cast away from Heaven during Lucifer’s rebellion? Your choices influence how the world reacts to you;
  • Immerse yourself in a narrative divided into five main chapters, each one dedicated to exploring the story of a specific character. As you progress, experience the weight of your decisions with central characters that mirrors the seven cardinal sins. Your choices not only shape the story but also impact your relationships;
  • Embark on an investigative journey with a point-and-click system: in each chapter, engage in time management events where your choices dictate whom you talk to and where you go. Collect vital information about the central character of that chapter to uncover hidden truths;
  • And, at last, enjoy a cool parallax camera that follows your mouse - but you can turn this off as well.

content_descriptors.notes: Notice: This game references suicide, grief, instances of cannibalism and strong religious themes throughout its narrative.

short_description: Customize your fate in a fallen world: forge bonds and uncover secrets in a tale of power, love, and the weight of grief. Your choices define your path: how will you rise in the hierarchy of the damned?
